statements: SELECT * FROM DemandPrediction;
SELECT id, product_name FROM DemandPrediction WHERE demand_level > 100;
SELECT product_name, demand_level, price FROM DemandPrediction WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT prediction_date, product_name, price FROM DemandPrediction ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(demand_level), MAX(price) FROM DemandPrediction;
SELECT * FROM DemandPrediction WHERE price < 100 AND prediction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY demand_level DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM DemandPrediction WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT id, product_name, prediction_date FROM DemandPrediction WHERE demand_level > 3 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC
SELECT id, demand_level FROM DemandPrediction WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND price > 200 ORDER BY demand_level ASC
SELECT * FROM DemandPrediction WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND demand_level < 3 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Demand_Forecast;
SELECT Forecasted_Demand, Forecast_Date FROM Demand_Forecast WHERE Product_ID = 1;
SELECT Product_ID, Forecasted_Demand FROM Demand_Forecast WHERE Forecast_Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT Strategy_Date, Base_Price FROM Pricing_Strategy WHERE Product_ID = 2 ORDER BY Strategy_Date DESC;
SELECT Product_ID, AVG(Forecasted_Demand) AS Avg_Demand FROM Demand_Forecast GROUP BY Product_ID;
SELECT * FROM Demand_Forecast WHERE Forecast_Date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT Product_ID, SUM(Forecasted_Demand) AS Total_Demand FROM Demand_Forecast GROUP BY Product_ID;
SELECT Product_ID, Forecast_Date, Forecasted_Demand FROM Demand_Forecast WHERE Forecasted_Demand > 1000 ORDER BY Forecasted_Demand DESC;
SELECT p.Product_ID, p.Base_Price, d.Forecast_Date, d.Forecasted_Demand FROM Pricing_Strategy p INNER JOIN Demand_Forecast d ON p.Product_ID = d.Product_ID;

SELECT d.Product_ID, d.Forecast_Date, d.Forecasted_Demand, p.Base_Price FROM Demand_Forecast d LEFT JOIN Pricing_Strategy p ON d.Product_ID = p.Product_ID WHERE p.Base_Price > 50 ORDER BY d.Forecasted_Demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT product_id, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 100;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE target_segment = 'Premium' AND price < 50;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, target_segment, price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE start_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, demand_date, demand_value FROM demand_history WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast JOIN demand_history ON demand_forecast.product_id = demand_history.product_id;
SELECT strategy_name, target_segment, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_strategy GROUP BY strategy_name, target_segment HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_strategies;
SELECT product_id, base_price, adjusted_price FROM price_strategies;
SELECT * FROM price_strategies WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT strategy_date, base_price FROM price_strategies ORDER BY strategy_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, product_id, adjusted_price FROM price_strategies WHERE base_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM price_strategies WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT strategy_id, base_price FROM price_strategies WHERE strategy_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(adjusted_price) AS total_price FROM price_strategies GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_price > 1000;
SELECT strategy_id, product_id, base_price FROM price_strategies ORDER BY base_price DESC, strategy_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(base_price) AS avg_price, MAX(adjusted_price) AS max_adjusted_price FROM price_strategies WHERE base_price > 50 AND strategy_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand FROM demand_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT strategy_id, pricing_strategy, strategy_description FROM pricing_strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_id, historical_demand FROM historical_data WHERE historical_demand > 1000
